text: 1.3: 1 Ko 13.13; Ga 5.6; Kor 1.4-6; Hi 6.10Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi ndɨkndɨk nde ndavi khavim, nde tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbuav, nde ŋaarir vhuuiŋra mbuav, wari won ndavi ndiv harigi gumgi ga ndɨɨi. Nde vhɨra wari wo ndavi havhargiap, nza wo Bakɨme Zisas Krais taagia zirɨrga tugar rargap wari ki. Nza ne nzuav, nza wo Ndia Fhe Bakɨme phorga ndavar ana ndikndigi.
